My Creative Process

All of my web development and design projects are based off a practiced formula to get the result that I am looking for

1

Discuss The Project

Have a sit down with the client. Discuss about the project what he/she would like to acomplish with the project. Also talk about the funding of the project and at last give he/she approximately the time i will be done with the project.

2

Brainstorming ^ Concept

I have a little alone time to think on various ways to finish, tackle challenges or bugs on the project. I make sure i come up with a way to accomplish that given project.

3

UI/UX Planning

Before the project is started there should be a UI/UX design already available to guide me through the project.

4

Interaction

Of course as the project is on-going i will show the client how far i have gone , tell them about some issues if there is any. They also tell me if there is any changes he/she would like to make to the on-going project.
